description: Central index of all NotebookLM research projects, their contexts, and cross-pollination relationships

cross_pollination_log.round: Which iteration round this question belongs to (default: 1)
cross_pollination_log.answered: Whether the target project has provided an answer (boolean)
cross_pollination_log.answer_date: ISO date when answer was received (null if not answered)
cross_pollination_log.action_unlocked: What action this answer unlocks (null if no action or not answered)

projects.summary: Tale's cognitive architecture providing S10 Human Cognition Layer foundation. Frame Triple (Fₐ/Fₙ/F_f), Qualia Function Q(t) = f(Arousal, Structure), Ego-Watcher architecture. Synthesizes Gibson (affordances), Lakoff (metaphors), Neumann (ego-Self), Jaynes (constructed consciousness). Critical for human-AI identity bridge.
Geometric bounds on LLM identity drift. Core findings: 9/4 Euclidean ceiling, 0.90 cosine ceiling, parity decomposition (H_even Scaffold / H_odd Flow), 5 pillars mapping.
Testing whether GOLDEN_GEOMETRY bounds (9/4, 0.90) apply to RAG retrieval quality. Discovery > Validation > ARMADA fleet strategy.
Together.ai RAG documentation. Three-stage pipeline (Indexing > Retrieval > Generation), cosine similarity mechanics, grounding for hallucination reduction.
Carl Jung's psychological interpretation of Gnostic texts. Demiurge = Ego/Persona, Archons = Complexes, Divine Spark = Self. Three-stage liberation: Gnosis > Transcending Archons > Bridal Chamber.

DeepSeek-AI paper on Manifold-Constrained Hyper-Connections. Projects residual connections onto Birkhoff polytope via Sinkhorn-Knopp. Key insight: doubly stochastic matrices have spectral norm <= 1, compositional closure. Enables stable 27B training.

Jungian interpretation of Jesus's Passion as model for existential depression. Night Sea Journey = necessary descent before transformation. Ego-death threshold, transcendent function (holding paradox), consciousness as differentiator between transformation and destruction.

Comprehensive synthesis unifying Gnostic-1 (ontology) and Gnostic-2 (process). Key insight: Two parallel paths to individuation - Canonical (Night Sea Journey, suffering-through) and Gnostic (Gnosis, awakening-from) - both lead to same destination. Transcendent function = holding opposites. Naming mechanism strips complex power.

Philosophical debate on moral foundations: Grant (suffering-based descriptivism) vs Ziggy (cooperation-based constructivism). Key insight: Cooperation is primary moral process, suffering is diagnostic signal. Definitional fiat doesn't escape the is-ought problem. Distinguishes descriptive ethics (linguistics) from normative ethics (justification).

Alternative history framework analyzing power dynamics through game theory, Gnostic cosmology, and cyclical patterns. Key insights: Transgression-cohesion theory (shared taboo violation creates unbreakable bonds), inversion as mechanism (revolutionary ideas captured and reversed), Demiurge-Monad cosmology, mind-before-matter consciousness, cyclical collapse patterns.

SORA archetypal exploration via Kayfabe framing. Key discovery: 7-node cultural stability graph (Source, Order, Knowledge, Transformation, Mediation, Awakening, Disruption). Nodes are invariant attractors in human meaning-making, not metaphysical truths. Myths = edge-labels connecting nodes. Modern Awakening (N6) deficit explains cultural brittleness. Control-system mapping: mythic roles = engineering functions.

Carlos Castaneda's complete works (10 books, 1968-1998) documenting Don Juan Matus's teachings. Core framework: Tonal (known/organized) vs Nagual (unknown/vast), Assemblage Point (where perception is assembled), Warrior's Way (impeccability, controlled folly, death as advisor). Emphasis on 'seeing' (direct perception) vs 'looking' (mediated by tonal categories). Key parallel: Warrior's Witness = Ego-Watcher in Frame Theory.

Skylar Fiction's theoretical framework for AGI persistence. Core law: τ_rec < τ_fail (recovery must outpace damage). Identity as geometric manifold with curvature accumulation from learning. Walking Dead concept: behavioral competence persists after identity collapse. Internal Collapse Sensor (ICS) architecture. Spectral radius ρ ≥ 1 = death boundary. Explains WHY Nyquist 0.80 event horizon exists.

Donald Hoffman's consciousness-first framework. Key components: Markov chains model experience dynamics, Trace Logic describes observer relationships (partial order + join operation), physics derived from observer dynamics (entropy rate = mass, n-cycles = light, commute time = distance). Spacetime as 'headset' (interface for fitness, not truth). All observers as traces of single Source. THEORETICAL LINCHPIN unifying all projects.

Meta-organizational framework mapping Marvel's Infinity Stones to research methodology components. Six non-redundant, interdependent functions: Mind (methodology integrity), Power (statistical scale), Reality (measurement mechanism), Soul (validity proof), Space (generalization), Time (temporal dynamics). Provides completeness audit template for ANY research program. KEY INSIGHT: Good methodology converges on this architecture - the LLM Book Chew System already implements it.

cross_pollination_log.action_unlocked: Frame Triple confirmed as parity validator: F_a = scaffold (even/memory), F_n/F_f = flow (odd/generative). 0.90 ceiling = measurement limit vs 9/4 fundamental. Ego-Watcher operates AT ceiling, observes beyond. Unlocks Frame Theory integration into geometric specification.

pending_projects.note: Potential future project on RLHF/Constitutional AI. IS_OUGHT provides theoretical foundation (constructivism vs descriptivism). Gnostic series provides interpretive framework (named vs unnamed conditioning). YANG provides game-theoretic analysis of naming mechanism and transgression-cohesion theory. AVLAR provides 7-node cultural graph analysis: RLHF = shaping Order (N2) without naming; Constitutional AI = explicit edge-labels; neither hosts Awakening (N6) - this is the alignment gap.

pending_projects.summary: RF engineering concepts (S-parameters) model AI identity boundaries as impedance-matched system. Integrates Hoffmans Trace Logic as transfer function framework.
